lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because:
because I can.
When I was 19 I went to Bolivia as part of a project with Netcorps. I spent 6 months volunteering and teaching at small micro financing organization. lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: My mother herself was given a chance to rise out of poverty. While she made it, so many others haven't and I still witness it in my travels. Now, with the blessings that I have here in the developed world, I wish to help give that chance to others.

lender.loan_because: I don't have a good reason. Why not?

I very much enjoy the construction process. It is such a great feeling to start a project as well as seeing the final results when the job is completed.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: I believe in supporting people who have a strong work ethic and want to improve their lives. I don't believe in giving a hand out, but I think that giving someone a hand up is a moral obligation we all have as human beings. No one succeeds on their own.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help. It's the right thing to do!
lender.occupational_info: I LOVE to knit and would like to make my living off it. By lending to people with knitting/fabric businesses maybe I can make that dream come true for others...

I love how I can help someone with just one click of a button.

lender.occupational_info: I teach science to 11-18 year olds.

lender.name: Tuan
lender.loan_because: john1335.org
lender.occupational_info: We solve problems using technology

lender.name: Joe McCord
lender.loan_because: it's alright.
lender.occupational_info: Fun, but scary.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It is a way to help people help themselves in which one can choose the individuals and the businesses that they find most appealing or worthy. It is rewarding to the lender and makes a big difference in the life of the recipient

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: This is a great idea as it empowers individuals. Small steps in a big world can make a difference.

lender.name: Gino D
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with so much in Canada so I hope to bless others with what I have.

lender.name: Shasta
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to succeed
lender.occupational_info: Hustle hard

lender.name: Mertensa LLC
lender.occupational_info: http://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=1462387292

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: it is a way I can directly impact lives of people without getting anything in return.
lender.occupational_info: I speak with people about chasing their dreams and push them to get up and do it!

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people get a leg up and better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I study how to manage forests with fire.

lender.name: Mon
lender.loan_because: People all around the world are in need of money to help stimulate their lives for the better, and I believe that micro-loans are a good way of doing it.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a laboratory and do biological tests that helps us understand diseases and disorders better so that hopefully a cure may one day come out of these test.

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: Give, and it shall be given unto you; good measure, pressed down, and shaken together, and running over, shall men give into your bosom. For with the same measure that ye mete withal it shall be measured to you again. ---- May God bless your family and your business.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to make people well and to care for people when they cannot take care of themselves.

lender.name: Stephen & Sarah
lender.loan_because: My wife & I both feel that everyone deserves a chance to succeed. Sarah was a Peace Corps Volunteer in Nicaragua and enjoyed every minute of her time there. We are looking to continue the momentum she helped create during her service.
lender.occupational_info: I am a senior manager at a software company managing the worldwide sales relationship between my company and one of the worlds largest computer manufacturer's. Sarah is a high school teacher, teaching in the Plato program. It is a credit recovery program that helps kids get back on track through an online curriculum and further reducing the dropout rate.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: To honor those who gave me their time, talents, and their treasures. I want everyone to have a chance at being self-supporting
lender.occupational_info: Buy and sell real estate. I am an educator, mentor to other entrepreneurs in real estate.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky that people gave me opportunities. Now it's my turn to give other people opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a daily newspaper in rural Pennsylvania. I cover education, government, business, crime, and anything else that comes up in my area.

lender.name: Doug and Julie
lender.loan_because: We are lucky enough to be able to help someone improve their life
lender.occupational_info: Julie is a nurse that takes care of mother's and babies after birth. Doug runs an electrical contracting business.

lender.name: dvsDave
lender.loan_because: it's more responsible and in the long run, can help more people than a charitable contribution.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: My cousin Ross sent me a Kiva Gift Certificate.
lender.occupational_info: I am a third grade student in Albuquerque, New Mexico.

lender.name: Anomaly
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Wang Ning
lender.loan_because: I want to help people but I am disillusioned about giving to charity. With many needing the donation money for supporting their infrastructure rather than using it for their causes.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: it is sustainable development in its truest form.

lender.name: cecilia
lender.loan_because: I like to give back what I recieved from God.
lender.occupational_info: I m interior designer.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.occupational_info: I work with people who have had brain injuries or strokes, and can no longer speak or swallow.

lender.name: Vineet
lender.loan_because:
In the absence of providence we have the infinite potential of the human spirit.
No one way of ameliorating poverty exists; pursue every avenue to help others.

lender.name: Jeannie
lender.loan_because: it warms my heart to offer assistance that may help others toward greater self-sufficiency.
lender.occupational_info: My work is business support within the Aerospace industry.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I want to do more good in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I take people on wilderness expeditions (backpacking, canoeing and climbing) so they can learn to be better to themselves, to each other and to the world. I also play guitar and cello, and sing and write songs.

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because: I can, and thus should.
lender.occupational_info: I repair and install machines that measure materials as they pass through the machine.

lender.name: Leila
lender.loan_because: I want to give to other people. I am not only serving my community but the world. People deserve the opportunity to have the chance to make a living and create a business. I am giving that chance to others by doing this.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student so I learn, but what I am making of my education is so much more than just learning. I am part of Amnesty International, fighting for human rights, and serving my community. My life is not only based around learning, but that learning has taught me to be giving.

lender.name: James/Data4marketers.com
lender.loan_because: I see good investments all around... All you need to do is look for them.
lender.occupational_info: I invest in several daily/live optin and coreg data feeds. I distribute these feeds to marketers around the world engaged in: email marketing, telemarketing, and direct/postal marketing with data that is diverse enough to cover sources for any type of product or category a company could be looking to promote.

lender.name: Ela
lender.loan_because: This can be a way to reach out to those who need it.
lender.occupational_info: Even if is small I want to help make a difference.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurs and small businesses are critical to local economies.
lender.occupational_info: I help to create and maintain affordable housing options for residents of my city.

lender.name: Clare
lender.loan_because: I became inspired after learning about this amazing technique used to help pull people out of poverty. It really makes me feel excited and happy to see how people in such harsh situations can go from being impoverished to empowered.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because: the people that have the will, the passion and the ability to try to take control over their life and future should be supported. One of the most important aspects in life: helping eachother anyway we can to make it a better place!
lender.occupational_info: running a group of small companies, all focussed on imporoving the quality of life, play and work.

lender.name: Clubbers
lender.loan_because: capitalism is what makes the world go round.
lender.occupational_info: Making sure the cash is where we think it is

lender.name: Elisa
lender.loan_because: everyone should have the ability to maximize what they can do with their God given talents and skills.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying science right now to become a doctor when I am older.

lender.name: Roxana
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Chanel
lender.loan_because: I myself is a entrepreneur who doesn't mind helping other entrepreneurs achieve their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently at Chico State majoring in entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Sonya
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Eckley
lender.loan_because: It's fashionable to do so

lender.name: Deborah
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital where I help pregnant women and people who are sick.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: we are to be held accountable for the money that God loans us do we use it for the good of people that has less then us or do we use it for self centeredness? we will each have to answer someday
lender.occupational_info: i provide the labor and material to put a roof over the heads of peoples houses

lender.name: Jean-mark
lender.loan_because: I was given a Kiva gift certificate from a very good friend as a birthday gift and I am so excited to help people around the world.

lender.name: jacobus
lender.loan_because: I would like to support small entrepenuers in building their dreams and believe this is an excellent way to do this!
lender.occupational_info: I am owner /Managing Director of a small but very international project managemnet training & consultancy company.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I feel God has called me to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I pay people for the jobs they do.

lender.name: Burn The Box Investments
lender.occupation: Software and Services Provider, Global Investor
lender.loan_because: We believe that if the world is our market, then we must not simply profit, but invest in that same market to sustain ourselves, and our customers.
lender.occupational_info: Mobile Application Software, Business Strategy and Operations Consulting Services. Global Investments.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Its an investment in someone's future.

lender.name: Yoann
lender.loan_because: I believe in the collective power of individuals to make a difference. Through Kiva, I can help people improve their lives by sponsoring their own initiatives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the development of in-flight entertainment and communication systems for commercial aircraft

lender.name: Joao
lender.loan_because:
It is better than simple giving donations. This encourages people to produce and find sustainable methods to help themselves.
It provides opportunity without us imposing on people what their livelihood should be.
It is about helping those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Universally the same as any student. Trying to learn without getting distracted.

lender.name: Logan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become more successful entrepreneurs and allow impoverished people sustain a better way of life.
lender.occupational_info: Freshman in high school

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Who wouldn't do this?

lender.name: Bobby
lender.loan_because: I can.
